title: Democrats Promote Tough-on-Crime Credentials as Party Plays Defense
description: With sheriffs vouching for them and a flood of ads proclaiming their support for the police, Democrats are shoring up their public safety bona fides. Still, some worry itâ€™s too late.
dc:creator: Katie Glueck and Trip Gabriel
media:credit: Bridget Bennett for The New York Times
media:description: Senator Catherine Cortez Masto, a Democrat of Nevada in a highly competitive race for re-election, has long highlighted her pro-law enforcement credentials.
